00012 static int PIDListCount = 0;
00014 static unsigned int PIDUpdateCount = 0;

00033 struct PIDStruct* PID_Init(struct PIDStruct* PIDS,double (*err_Calc)(void* info),void (*output_Func)(void* info, double err),void *info,int divider){
00034         PIDS->kp = 0;
00035         PIDS->ki = 0;
00036         PIDS->kd = 0;
00037         PIDS->imax = 0;
00038         PIDS->tolerance = 0;
00039         PIDS->error_cumu = 0;
00040         PIDS->last_error = 0;
00041 
00042         PIDS->err_Calc = err_Calc;
00043         PIDS->output_Func = output_Func;
00044         PIDS->info = info;
00045         PIDS->start = 0;
00046 
00047         PIDS->error_term = 0;
00048         PIDS->PIDResult = 0;
00049         if(divider == 0) divider = 1;
00050         PIDS->update_divider = divider;    
00051 
00052         return PIDS;
00053 }

00065 struct PIDStruct* PID_SetParameter(struct PIDStruct* PIDS,double kp,double ki,double kd,double imax,double tolerance){
00066         PIDS->kp = kp;
00067         PIDS->ki = ki;

00073 
00080 double PID_Calc(struct PIDStruct* PIDS){
00081         double p_term;
00082         double i_term;
00083         double d_term;
00084 
00085         p_term = PIDS->kp * PIDS->error_term;
00086 
00087         PIDS->error_cumu += PIDS->error_term;
00088         if (PIDS->error_cumu > PIDS->imax){
00089                 PIDS->error_cumu = PIDS->imax;
00090         } else if (PIDS->error_cumu < - PIDS->imax){
00091                 PIDS->error_cumu = -PIDS->imax;
00092         }
00093 
00094         i_term = PIDS->ki * PIDS->error_cumu;
00095 
00096         d_term = PIDS->kd * (PIDS->error_term - PIDS->last_error);
00097         PIDS->last_error = PIDS->error_term;
00098 
00099         return(p_term + i_term + d_term);
00100 }
00101 
00102 void PID_Update(struct PIDStruct* PIDS){
00103         if(PIDS->start == 0) return;
00104         PIDS->error_term = PIDS->err_Calc(PIDS->info);
00105         PIDS->PIDResult = PID_Calc(PIDS);
00106         PIDS->output_Func(PIDS,PIDS->PIDResult);
00107         return;    
00108 }
00109 
00114 void PID_Start(struct PIDStruct* PIDS){
00115         PIDS->start = 1;
00116         return;
00117 }
00118 
00123 void PID_Stop(struct PIDStruct* PIDS){
00124         PIDS->start = 0;
00125         return;
00126 }

00133 int PID_Search_List(struct PIDStruct* PIDS){
00134         int i;
00135         for(i = 0; i < PIDListCount; i++)
00136                 if(PIDList[i] == PIDS) return i;
00137         return -1;
00138 }
00139 
00146 void PID_Push(struct PIDStruct* PIDS){
00147         int pos = PID_Search_List(PIDS);
00148         if(pos == -1){
00149                 PIDList[PIDListCount] = PIDS;
00150                 PIDListCount++;
00151         }
00152         if(PIDS->update_divider > MaxCount)
00153                 MaxCount = PIDS->update_divider;
00154         return;
00155 }
00156 
00164 void PID_UpdateAll(void){
00165         int i;
00166         PIDUpdateCount++;
00167         for(i = 0; i < PIDListCount; i++){
00168                 if(PIDUpdateCount % PIDList[i]->update_divider == 0)
00169                         PID_Update(PIDList[i]);
00170         }
00171         if(PIDUpdateCount == MaxCount)PIDUpdateCount = 0;
00172         return;
00173 }

00183 double POS_ComputerTarget(struct PosInfo* POSS){
00184         double s;
00185         //      double T1,T2,Tend;
00186         int t= POSS->time;
00187         int time_region = 0;
00188 
00189         if(POSS->T1 < POSS->T2){
00190                 if(POSS->time < POSS->T1){
00191                         POSS->timeRegion = 1;           
00192                 } else if(POSS->time < POSS->T2){
00193                         POSS->timeRegion = 2;
00194                 } else if(POSS->time < POSS->Tend){
00195                         POSS->timeRegion = 3;
00196                 } else {
00197                         POSS->timeRegion = 4;
00198                 }
00199         } else {
00200                 if(POSS->time < POSS->Tend / 2){
00201                         POSS->timeRegion = 1;
00202                 } else if(POSS->time < POSS->Tend){
00203                         POSS->timeRegion = 3;
00204                 } else {
00205                         POSS->timeRegion = 4;
00206                 }
00207         }       
00208         time_region = POSS->timeRegion;
00209         //      T1 = POSS->T1;
00210         //      T2 = POSS->T2;
00211         //      Tend = POSS->Tend;
00212         if(POSS->initPos < POSS->targetPos){
00213 
00214                 switch(time_region){
00215                         case 1:
00216                                 s = t * t * POSS->acceleration / 2 + (double)POSS->initPos;
00217                                 break;
00218                         case 2:
00219                                 s =   (double)POSS->topSpeed * ( t - POSS->T1) 
00220                                         + (double)POSS->topSpeed * POSS->topSpeed / (2 * POSS->acceleration)
00221                                         //+ (double)POSS->top_speed / 2.0 * T1
00222                                         + (double)POSS->initPos;
00223                                 break;
00224                         case 3:
00225                                 s =   -1 * (t-POSS->Tend) * (t-POSS->Tend) * POSS->deceleration / 2 + (double)POSS->targetPos;
00226                                 break;
00227                         case 4:
00228                                 s =   POSS->targetPos;
00229                                 break;
00230                 }
00231         }
00232 
00233         // the case that the curve decreases with time
00234         else{
00235                 switch(time_region){
00236                         case 1:
00237                                 s = -1 * t * t * POSS->acceleration / 2 + (double)POSS->initPos;
00238                                 break;
00239                         case 2:
00240                                 s =  -1* (double)POSS->topSpeed * ( t - POSS->T1) 
00241                                         - (double)POSS->topSpeed * POSS->topSpeed / (2 * POSS->acceleration)
00242                                         + (double)POSS->initPos;
00243                                 break;
00244                         case 3:
00245                                 s =   (t-POSS->Tend) * (t-POSS->Tend) * POSS->deceleration / 2 + (double)POSS->targetPos;
00246                                 break;
00247                         case 4:
00248                                 s =   POSS->targetPos;
00249                                 break;
00250                 }
00251 
00252         }
00253         return s;       
00254 
00255 }

00264 double PosInfoErrCal(void* tempptr){
00265         struct PosInfo* POSS = (struct PosInfo*)tempptr;
00266         double correctPos = POS_ComputerTarget(POSS);
00267         return (double)Encoder_ReadBuffer(POSS->encoderChannel) - correctPos; 
00268 }

00278 void PosInfoOutFunc(void* tempptr,double result){
00279         struct PosInfo* POSS = (struct PosInfo*)tempptr;
00280         Motor_SetPWM(POSS->motor,result);
00281         return;
00282 }

00293 double VelInfoErrCal(void* tempptr){
00294         struct VelInfo* VELS = (struct VelInfo*)tempptr;
00295         double currentSpeed;
00296         int newPos = Encoder_ReadBuffer(VELS->encoderChannel);
00297         currentSpeed = newPos - VELS->oldPos;
00298         VELS->oldPos = newPos;
00299         return currentSpeed - VELS->targetSpeed;
00300 }

00313         return;

00323 double ThetaInfoErrCal(void* tempptr){
00324         struct ThetaInfo* THES = (struct ThetaInfo*)tempptr;
00325         return THES->targetTheta - THES->pos->theta; 
00326 }

00337 void ThetaInfoOutFunc(void* tempptr,double result){
00338         struct ThetaInfo* THES = (struct ThetaInfo*)tempptr;
00339         if(result < 0){
00340                 THES->motorL->targetSpeed -= result;
00341         } else {
00342                 THES->motorR->targetSpeed -= result;
00343         }
00344         return;
00345 }

00365 struct PIDStruct* PID_Init_Pos(struct PIDStruct* PIDS,double acc,double topSpeed,double dece,int targetPos,int initPos,struct Motor_Struct* motor,int encoderChannel,int divider){
00366         struct PosInfo* POSS;
00367         double posDiff = targetPos - initPos;
00368         if(posDiff < 0)
00369                 posDiff = -posDiff;
00370 
00371         POSS = (struct PosInfo*)malloc(sizeof(struct PosInfo));
00372         POSS->acceleration = acc;
00373         POSS->topSpeed =topSpeed;
00374         POSS->deceleration = dece;
00375         POSS->targetPos = targetPos;
00376         POSS->initPos = initPos;
00377         POSS->time = 0;
00378 
00379         POSS->T1 = POSS->topSpeed / POSS->acceleration;
00380         POSS->Tend =    (posDiff / POSS->topSpeed)
00381                 +       (POSS->topSpeed / (POSS->acceleration * 2.0))
00382                 +       (POSS->topSpeed / (POSS->deceleration * 2.0));
00383         POSS->T2 = POSS->Tend - (POSS->topSpeed / POSS->deceleration);
00384 
00385         POSS->timeRegion = 0;
00386         //      POSS->pwmChannel= pwmChannel;
00387         POSS->motor = motor;
00388         POSS->encoderChannel = encoderChannel;
00389 
00390         return PID_Init(PIDS,PosInfoErrCal,PosInfoOutFunc,POSS,divider);
00391 }

00404 struct PIDStruct* PID_Init_Vel(struct PIDStruct* PIDS,double targetSpeed,struct Motor_Struct* motor,int encoderChannel,int divider){
00405         struct VelInfo* VELS;
00406         VELS = (struct VelInfo*)malloc(sizeof(struct VelInfo));
00407         VELS->targetSpeed = targetSpeed;
00408         VELS->oldPos = 0;
00409         //      VELS->pwmChannel = pwmChannel;
00410         VELS->motor = motor;
00411         VELS->encoderChannel = encoderChannel;
00412         return PID_Init(PIDS,VelInfoErrCal,VelInfoOutFunc,VELS,divider);
00413 }

00427 struct PIDStruct* PID_Init_Theta(struct PIDStruct* PIDS,double targetTheta,struct VelInfo* motorL, struct VelInfo* motorR, struct Pos* pos,int divider){
00428         struct ThetaInfo* THES;
